origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceRegulationAPI.get_focus_areas', 'description': 'This function provides the current focus areas of financial regulation for a specified institution.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'institution', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the financial institution, e.g., People's Bank of China.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'focusAreas', 'description': 'A list of current focus areas in financial regulation.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceRegulationAPI.get_focus_areas, 它的参数输入如下: 'institution'是'People's Bank of China'.
